mapper.select: SELECT pNo, cNo, pCode, pName, pImg1 FROM tbl_product

SELECT *, (SELECT salePrice FROM tbl_sale_product WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_sale_product.pNo ORDER BY saleEnd DESC LIMIT 1) recentPrice, (SELECT salePrice FROM tbl_sale_product WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_sale_product.pNo AND progress = 4 ORDER BY salePrice LIMIT 1) immediatePurchacePrice, (SELECT desiredPrice FROM tbl_hope_purchase WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_hope_purchase.pNo ORDER BY desiredPrice DESC LIMIT 1) immediateSellingPrice
FROM tbl_product WHERE pNo = ${pNo}
